front.title: IEEE Standard for High Voltage Gas-Insulated Substations Rated Above 52 kV

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The technical requirements for the design, fabrication, testing, and installation of a gas-insulated substations are covered. The parameters to be supplied by the purchaser are set, and the technical requirements for the design, fabrication, testing, and installation details to be furnished by the manufacturer are established.
